pageTitle: Winter solstice heralds the coming of spring | CanyonCourier.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {27781=Canyon Courier | circulation@canyoncourier.com | 303-350-1030 27902 Meadow Drive, Ste 200, Evergreen, CO 80439 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, 35100=Copyright © 2015, 22271=Looking out the window, I still see snow on the ground, and we will have snow for at least three more months. However, this past Monday, Dec. 20, was the changing point, and yesterday was the beginning of the change, the winter solstice, or the first day of winter.}
